mean_en: to produce a book, magazine, CD-ROM, etc. and sell it to the public; to print a letter, an article, etc. in a newspaper or magazine
sentence: She hopes that her book will be published so everyone can buy it.
sentence_trans: 她希望自己的书能够出版，这样每个人都可以购买。
word_etyma: publ公众 + ish动词后缀 → 使面向公众 → publish出版
